plot outline: Sollamatten is a 2013 Indian Tamil film, directed by N P Ismail. The film stars Sakthi, Jismy, Adithya, Laxmi and Jithan in lead roles. The film had musical score by Rajesh Mohan. Watch the full movie, Sollamatten online, only on Eros Now.
